plays.text: Penalty to Eric Belanger 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Joe Sakic
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Elbowing Dan Hinote
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for High Sticking Aaron Miller
Goal scored by Chris Drury assisted by Peter Forsberg and Patrick Roy
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay assisted by Milan Hejduk and Greg de Vries
Penalty to Steve Reinprecht 2 minutes for Hooking Mattias Norstrom
Penalty to Craig Johnson 2 minutes for Hooking Rob Blake
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Greg de Vries and Mike Keane
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for High Sticking Zigmund Palffy
Penalty to Andreas Lilja 2 minutes for Tripping Joe Sakic
Penalty to Mike Keane 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Chris Drury 2 minutes for Hooking Craig Johnson
Goal scored by Adam Foote unassisted
Penalty to Steve Heinze 2 minutes for Roughing Darius Kasparaitis
